title: Will Be Listing 50 new SGC Graded T212 1910 & 1911 Obak Cards
author: 111gecko

posts.post_title: Will Be Listing 50 new SGC Graded T212 1910 & 1911 Obak Cards
posts.post_content:
I will be listing about 50 recently received cards that were graded by SGC on Ebay next week. I wanted to put them up here first. Send your set needs lists and I will check and see if I have them.

There are about 30 1911s & 20 1910s.

[url]NEWVENTR1@AOL.COM[/url]
